firstCommandPhraseGrammarProd

grammar firstCommandPhrase(askTellActorTo) :   FirstCommandProdWithActor

en_us.t[5107]

(‘ask’ | ‘tell’ | ‘a’ | ‘t’) singleNounOnly->actor_
‘to’ commandPhrase->cmd_

grammar firstCommandPhrase(commandOnly) :   FirstCommandProd

parser.t[781]

commandPhrase->cmd_

grammar firstCommandPhrase(withActor) :   FirstCommandProdWithActor

en_us.t[5095]

singleNounOnly->actor_ ‘,’ commandPhrase->cmd_
